name: Roll Arena
description:
Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.

Catch the falling dice with your dice launcher to fire them back at your enemies. Dice that you don't catch will roll to spawn enemies or other bad things. How long can you survive?

Controls

  • WASD-Move
  • Mouse-Look
  • RMB-Aim Dice Cannon
  • RMB+LMB-Fire Dice Cannon
  • E-Import New Dice

Audio-https://opengameart.org/content/xeon-theme-remastered
